planets.name: Mercury
planets.fun_fact: The temperature on Mercury's surface ranges from 100K to 700K (-280°F to 800°F)

planets.name: Venus
planets.fun_fact: The sun rises in the West and sets in the East on Venus

planets.name: Mars
planets.fun_fact: Olympus Mons on Mars is the highest known mountain in the Solar System (13.6 miles or 21.9km)

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.fun_fact: Jupiter is only 1/1000 the mass of the sun

planets.name: Saturn
planets.fun_fact: Saturn's moon Titan is the only known moon in the solar system with an atmosphere

planets.name: Uranus
planets.fun_fact: Uranus can have wind speeds up to 250 meters/second (560mph)

planets.name: Neptune
planets.fun_fact: Neptune is the only true planet that cannot be seen with the unaided eye and was discovered through prediction

planets.name: Pluto
planets.fun_fact: Pluto actually has five known moons: Charon, Styx, Nyx, Kerboros, and Hydra

planets.name: Eris
planets.fun_fact: Eris has more mass than Pluto by 27% although Pluto is slightly larger in volume
